original_definition: 'heat generator' means the part of a heater that generates the heat using one or more of the following processes:combustion of fossil fuels and/or biomass fuels;use of the Joule effect in electric resistance heating elements;capture of ambient heat from an air source, water source or ground source, and/or waste heat;whereby a heat generator designed for a heater and a heater housing to be equipped with such a heat generator shall be also considered a heater;
